title: EPIC-001: Seed Models Configuration

epic.title: Data Platform Foundation
epic.goal: Establish persistent storage, schema, migrations, and core data access layer to support all backend operations

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Seed migration adds models: gpt-4-turbo, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-opus, claude-3-sonnet
Each model has: provider, cost_per_1k_prompt_tokens, cost_per_1k_completion_tokens, context_window, enabled=true
Model Registry component can load models from DB on startup
Admin can update model metadata via future API (out of scope for this story, note in docs)
description: Seed models table with initial LLM providers (OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude) including pricing and context window metadata.
